member.name: T:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200
member.summary: DotNet class to operate the THorlabs DC2200 instrument

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.Finalize
member.summary: Release the resources on the Thorlabs DC2200 instrument

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: This function creates an IVI instrument driver session, typically using the C session instrument handle.
member.param: The instrument handle that is used to create an IVI instrument driver session.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
This function initializes the instrument driver session and performs the following initialization actions:
(1) Opens a session to the Default Resource Manager resource and a session to the selected device using the Resource Name. (2) Performs an identification query on the Instrument. (3) Resets the instrument to a known state. (4) Sends initialization commands to the instrument. (5) Returns an instrument handle which is used to differentiate between different sessions of this instrument driver.
Notes: (1) Each time this function is invoked an unique session is opened.
member.param: This parameter specifies the interface of the device that is to be initialized. The exact syntax to be used for this parameter is shown in the note below.
Performs an In-System Verification. Checks if the resource matches the BP2 vendor and product id.
Performs Reset operation and places the instrument in a pre-defined reset state.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.get_device_count(System.UInt32@)
member.returns:
Operational return status. Contains either a completion code or an error code. Instrument driver specific codes that may be returned in addition to the VISA error codes defined in VPP-4.3 and vendor specific codes, are as follows.
Completition Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_SUCCESS Initialization successful VI_WARN_NSUP_ID_QUERY Identification query not supported VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET Reset not supported
Error Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_ERROR_FAIL_ID_QUERY Instrument identification query failed
Vendor Specific Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.get_device_info(System.UInt32,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Boolean@,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.returns:
Operational return status. Contains either a completion code or an error code. Instrument driver specific codes that may be returned in addition to the VISA error codes defined in VPP-4.3 and vendor specific codes, are as follows.
Completition Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_SUCCESS Initialization successful VI_WARN_NSUP_ID_QUERY Identification query not supported VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET Reset not supported
Error Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_ERROR_FAIL_ID_QUERY Instrument identification query failed
Vendor Specific Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.reset
member.summary: Places the instrument in a default state.
member.returns:
Operational return status. Contains either a completion code or an error code. Instrument driver specific codes that may be returned in addition to the VISA error codes defined in VPP-4.3 and vendor specific codes, are as follows.
Completition Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_SUCCESS Reset ooperation successful VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET Reset not supported
Vendor Specific Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.self_test(System.Int16@,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: This function causes the instrument to perform a self-test and returns the result of that self-test.
member.param: Numeric result from self-test operation 0 = no error (test passed)
Self-test status message.
member.returns:
Operational return status. Contains either a completion code or an error code. Instrument driver specific codes that may be returned in addition to the VISA error codes defined in VPP-4.3 and vendor specific codes, are as follows.
Completition Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_SUCCESS Self-test operation successful VI_WARN_NSUP_SELF_TEST Self-test not supported
Vendor Specific Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.error_query(System.Int32@,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Queries the instrument and returns instrument-specific error information.
member.param: Instrument error code.
Error message.
member.returns:
Operational return status. Contains either a completion code or an error code. Instrument driver specific codes that may be returned in addition to the VISA error codes defined in VPP-4.3 and vendor specific codes, are as follows.
Completition Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_SUCCESS Error query operation successful VI_WARN_NSUP_ERROR_QUERY Error query not supported
Vendor Specific Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.revision_query(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: This function returns the revision of the instrument driver and the firmware revision of the instrument being used.
member.param: Instrument driver revision.Instrument driver revision.
Instrument firmware revision.
member.returns:
Operational return status. Contains either a completion code or an error code. Instrument driver specific codes that may be returned in addition to the VISA error codes defined in VPP-4.3 and vendor specific codes, are as follows.
Completition Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- VI_SUCCESS Revision query successful VI_WARN_NSUP_REV_QUERY Instrument revision query not supported
Vendor Specific Codes ---------------------------------------------------------------- For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.get_head_info(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32@)
member.summary: This function returns the LED head identification information.
member.param:
This parameter returns the serial number of the connected LED head.
Notes: (1) The array must contain at least 256 elements ViChar[256]. (2) You may pass VI_NULL if you do not need this value.

This parameter returns the name of the connected LED head.
Notes: (1) The array must contain at least 256 elements ViChar[256]. (2) You may pass VI_NULL if you do not need this value.

This parameter returns the LED head type.
Valid return values are:
NO_HEAD (0) - no LED head found FOUR_CHANNEL_HEAD (1) - four channel LED head ONE_CHANNEL_HEAD (2) - single channel LED head NOT_SUPPORTED_HEAD (253) - not supported head UNKNOWN_HEAD (254) - unknown head ONE_CHANNEL_HEAD_OLD (255) - old standard LED head
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.param:
Select output terminal:
1 = 10A/12Pin connector 2 = 2A/4Pin connector
Limit Voltage
This parameter returns the user defined current limit in ampere.
This parameter returns the user defined current limit in ampere.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.setLimitCurrent(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the current limit. This limit may not exceed the LEDs limit specified in the LED head.
member.param:
This parameter specifies the current limit in ampere.
Range: 0.0 .. 2.0 (A) (limited by maximum limit) Default: 0.0 (A)
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.setOperationMode(System.Int32)
member.param:
This parameter specifies the operation mode.
Valid values are:
TLDC2200_LD_OPMODE_CC (1) // constant current mode TLDC2200_LD_OPMODE_CB (2) // constant brightness mode TLDC2200_LD_OPMODE_PWM (3) // PWM mode TLDC2200_LD_OPMODE_PULS (4) // Pulse mode TLDC2200_LD_OPMODE_IMOD (5) // Internal modulation mode TLDC2200_LD_OPMODE_EMOD (6) // External modulation mode TLDC2200_LD_OPMODE_TTL (7) // TTL mode
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.getOperationMode(System.Int32@)
member.param:
This parameter returns the actual operation mode.
constant current mode (0) PWM mode (1) External modulation mode (2) PConstant Brightness (3) Pulse mode (4) Internal modulation mode (5) TTL mode (6)
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.setPWMFrequency(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the PWM frequency in hertz.
member.param:
This parameter specifies the PWM frequency in hertz. The valid resolution between 1Hz and 1000Hz is 1Hz. Above 1kHz the valid resolution is 100Hz. The desired value will be coerced if the resolution is out of range.
Range: 1 .. 10000 (Hz) Default: 1 (Hz)
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.summary: Reads the content of the instruments status register. Refer to the instrument user's manual for more details on registers.
member.param:
This parameter returns the status register value. (see manual for closer description)
#define STAT_VCC_FAIL_CHANGED 0x0001 #define STAT_VCC_FAIL 0x0002 #define STAT_OTP_CHANGED 0x0004 #define STAT_OTP 0x0008 #define STAT_NO_LED1_CHANGED 0x0010 #define STAT_NO_LED1 0x0020 #define STAT_LED_OPEN1_CHANGED 0x0040 #define STAT_LED_OPEN1 0x0080 #define STAT_LED_LIMIT1_CHANGED 0x0100 #define STAT_LED_LIMIT1 0x0200 #define STAT_IFC_REFRESH_CHANGED 0x1000
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.getWavelength(System.Single@)
member.summary: This function returns the wavelength information of the connected LED head.
member.param:
This parameter returns the wavelength in [nm] of the connected LED head. In case there is no information available this value will be set to zero.
Notes: You may pass VI_NULL if you do not need this value.
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.name: M:Thorlabs.TLDC2200_64.Interop.TLDC2200.getForwardBias(System.Single@)
member.summary: This function returns the forward bias in [V] of the connected LED head.
member.param:
This parameter returns the forward bias in [V] of the connected LED head. In case there is no information available this value will be set to zero.
Notes: (1) You may pass VI_NULL if you do not need this value.
member.returns: This is the error code returned by the function call. For error codes and descriptions see <Error Message>.

member.param:
Select output terminal:
1 = 10A/12Pin connector 2 = 2A/4Pin connector

This parameter returns the forward bias in [V] of the connected LED head. In case there is no information available this value will be set to zero.
Notes: (1) You may pass VI_NULL if you do not need this value.
